agiletrack.swing

Class JDateChooser

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • agiletrack.swing.JDateChooser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class JDateChooser
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This date chooser provides a combo box for selecting dates. The date can be typed into the input field, or selected from a combo popup which provides a GUI calendar date picker. The text date parsing is unique in that numerous date formats can be handled by the text date parser.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • showDatePicker

        public void showDatePicker()
        Toggle the visiblity of the date picker selection popup. This is used as a response to the combo box toggle button, but it can be manually toggled as well if there is some need.

      • hideDatePicker

        public void hideDatePicker()
        Hide the date picker popup if it is currently visible.

        Handle parsing the text field date and updating the rest of the UI accorindingly.

      • addActionListener

        public final void addActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
        Add an action listener. The JCalendar provides ActionEvents for clicks as well as for moving the mouse between date cells.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener object

        private final void fireActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent event)

      • setDate

        public void setDate(java.util.Date date)
        Set the current selected date of the date chooser. The date may be null. This will update the text field and the rest of the UI to reflect the change.
        Parameters:
        date - the newly current selected date

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled()

      • setDisabled

        public void setDisabled()

      • setOriginalDate

        public void setOriginalDate(java.util.Date date)
        Set the originally selected date. Used in detecting changes in the date selection of the component.
        Parameters:
        date - the originally selected date

      • getDate

        public java.util.Date getDate()
        Get the currently chosen date.
        Returns:
        the date currently selected, or null if no date is selected (or if text date is invalid)

      • isDateChanged

        public boolean isDateChanged()
        Check to see if the currently selected date differs from the original date holder variable.
        Returns:
        true if the date selection has changed, false otherwise

      • isInPopup

        private static boolean isInPopup(java.awt.Component source)
        Try to determine if an event is within the popup window so that it can be automatically closed if an event occurs outside of it.
        Parameters:
        source - source component
        Returns:
        true is source component is a descendent of the JDateChooser
